meanings.sent1: The copperier coin was shinier than the rest.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had a copperier hue than mine.
meanings.sent3: The copperier paint made the room look like a giant penny.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a copperier glow.
meanings.sent5: The copperier metal gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: More copper in color or material.
meanings.sent1: The copperier wire conducted electricity better.
meanings.sent2: The vase had a copperier sheen than expected.
meanings.sent3: The copperier hair dye turned out to be a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The old car had a copperier look after the restoration.
meanings.sent5: The copperier fabric caught the light beautifully.
